sentences.en: A life of John Paul Jones had long interested him.
sentences.cn: 他很久以来一直都想创作一部关于约翰·保罗·琼斯的传记作品。

sentences.en: Anna tried to look interested. Actually, she was bored stiff.
sentences.cn: 安娜努力装出感兴趣的样子。实际上，她腻烦透了。

sentences.en: Can I just ask something 'cos I'm really quite interested in this.
sentences.cn: 我能不能问个问题，因为我对这个真的很感兴趣。

sentences.en: Car buyers are more interested in safety and reliability than speed.
sentences.cn: 购车者们更感兴趣的是汽车的安全性和可靠性，而不是它的速度。

sentences.en: Consumers are increasingly interested in the authentically exotic tastes.
sentences.cn: 消费者对于真正的异国风味越来越情有独钟。

sentences.en: I think the young man is getting interested in gardening.
sentences.cn: 我认为这个年轻人开始对园艺产生兴趣了。

sentences.en: I thought she might be interested in Paula's proposal.
sentences.cn: 我觉得她对葆拉的提议可能会感兴趣。

sentences.en: I was interested in alternative medicine and becoming an aromatherapist.
sentences.cn: 我对替代疗法非常感兴趣，想做个芳香疗法治疗师。

sentences.en: I wasn’t sure if he was really interested or if he was just being polite.
sentences.cn: 我不敢肯定他是真的感兴趣，还是出于礼貌而已。

sentences.en: If she ever fancies a job swap, I could be interested.
sentences.cn: 如果她想和别人互换工作，我会很感兴趣的。

sentences.en: It bothered me that boys weren't interested in me.
sentences.cn: 男孩子们对我不感兴趣令我很烦恼。

sentences.en: It is assumed that you are interested in achieving greater self-awareness.
sentences.cn: 假定大家都想变得更有自知之明。

sentences.en: Neither Anna nor I are interested in high finance.
sentences.cn: 安娜和我对巨额融资都不感兴趣。

sentences.en: Paul is self-taught and became interested in photography just four years ago.
sentences.cn: 保罗是自学的，他四年前才开始对摄影产生兴趣。

sentences.en: Untypically for a man in that situation he became interested in Buddhism.
sentences.cn: 他在那种情况下对佛教产生兴趣并不稀奇。

sentences.en: We're interested in the source of these fictitious rumours.
sentences.cn: 我们对这些子虚乌有的谣言从何而来很感兴趣。

words.tran_cn: 有趣的；引起兴趣的，令人关注的
兴趣，爱好；利息；趣味；同行
使……感兴趣；引起……的关心；使……参与
感兴趣的；有权益的；有成见的

trans.tran_en: giving a lot of attention to something because you want to find out more about it or because you enjoy it
